title.value: New way of reception the potato and corn concentrate

person.name: Litvyak, V.V., National Academy of Sciences (Belarus). Scientific and Practical Center for Foodstuffs
Pozdnyakov, V.M., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)
Lisovskaya, D.P., Belarus Trade and Economic Univ. of Consumer Cooperation, Gomel (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there was presented a study into improvement of the production technology of potato concentrate as a result of the development of a new technological scheme of multicomponent concentrate based on potatoes and corn, with the possibility of acidification with various biologically active organic acids. The way of reception of a potato (Solanum tuberosum) and corn concentrate, which will allow to develop the technological scheme of reception of a multicomponent concentrate on basis of a potato and corn is offered, to receive the new foodstuff possessing high flavouring and physical and chemical properties. And also it is essential to expand its functionality that can form a basis for creation of the whole spectrum of domestic nonalcoholic and alcoholic drinks of the functional purpose possessing preventive either treatment and prophylactic or medical action.
